DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Plasma Amino Acid Concentrations After Dairy Consumption
DOC.criteria: Age 60y BMI 2130 kg/m2 Nonsmoking Healthy assess NIZO lifestyle health questionnaire Regular normal Dutch eating habit assess NIZO lifestyle health questionnaire ( 3 main meal per day ) Veins suitable cannulation ( blood sample ) Participation clinical trial include blood sample and/or administration substance 30 day Day 01 study Having history medical surgical event may significantly affect study outcome , include : Inflammatory bowel disease , hepatitis , pancreatitis , ulcer , gastrointestinal rectal bleeding ; major gastrointestinal tract surgery gastrectomy , gastroenterostomy , bowel resection ; know suspect gastrointestinal disorder , colon GI tract cancer Use follow medication : glucose lower drug , insulin ; medication may impact gastric emptying ( e.g . gastric acid inhibitor laxative ) Diagnosed diabetes , treat high blood glucose increase fast blood glucose ( > 7 mmol/l finger prick blood ) assess screen visit For men : Hb < 8,5 mmol/l assess screening visit ; woman : Hb < 7,5 mmol/l . Use protein supplement Mental status incompatible proper conduct study A selfreported report food allergy sensitivity dairy ingredients A selfreported allergy sensitivity acetaminophen Alcohol consumption > 28 units/week 4/day Reported unexplained weight loss weight gain > 3 kg month prior prestudy screening , intention lose weight study period Reported slimming medically prescribe diet Recent blood donation ( < 1 month prior Day 01 study ) Not willing afraid give blood donation study Personnel NIZO food research Wageningen University , department Human Nutrition , partner first second degree relatives Not general practitioner Not willing accept informationtransfer concern participation study , information regard health , like laboratory result eventual adverse event general practitioner
